en.description: Written correspondence, parcel, direct postal container, 1st class shipment, EMS shipment, shipment with goods «Multikonvert», online parcel, online courier, standard parcel, courier parcel, express parcel, Direct Mail packet, heavy shipment, letter 2.0, courier letter, express letter, Optimal EMS.

en.name: Shipment attributes
en.description: Attributes define type, category, characteristic of any shipment and also particular operations related to it.

en.name: Shipment storage
en.description: Service of Postal operator. Shipment is stored until it is handed over to the addressee. The terms of the service are specified in Code of Postal Services.

en.name: Shipment with delivery notification (in international postal exchange)
en.description: «Shipment with delivery notification» is a registered shipment.The sender charges the post office operator to notify him or the person, whom he indicates to notify him, when the shipment is delivered and who receives it.

en.name: Shipment with goods «Multikonvert»
en.description:
Domestic shipment with goods. Enclosure, size, weight and packing method are specified in Procedure of collection, processing, transporting and delivery of «Multikonvert» domestic shipment .

The goods may be inserted in the cover or put into special envelope.

Note: This service replaced « Interactive shipment » service (due to the order № 535-p issued by FSUE « Russian Post » on 24.12.2010)

en.name: Shipment with list of enclosures
en.description: Registered insured shipment, accepted unpacked with the list of enclosures. The sender declares the value as per its price or market value.

en.name: Small packet
en.description: International shipment, which contains sample of goods or small items. Enclosure, size, weight and packing method are specified in Code of Postal services.

en.name: Standard shipment with goods («KPO standard»)
en.description: Domestic shipment with goods. Enclosure, size, weight and delivery methods are specified in Description for the service.

en.name: Temporary mail storage
en.description: Post office operator stores undistributed or unclaimed shipments or prohibited articles or shipments with the mark «Is not subject to return», which were not delivered to the addressee.

en.name: Track letter
en.description: Domestic shipment with written message, printed media, publications, documents, photos or other enclosures which are allowed for this type of shipment. Size, weight, delivery and packing methods are specified In Description of the service «Track letter». This type of delivery refers to the category «ordinary». It is possible to track the process (key operations) of the delivery using tracking number. Delivered to letterbox or P.O. box.

en.name: Track postcard
en.description: Domestic shipment in the form of the message written on the special blank, sent unsealed. Size, weight, delivery and packing methods are specified in Description of the service «Track postcard». This type of delivery refers to the category «ordinary». It is possible to track the process (key operations) of the delivery using tracking number. Delivered to letterbox or P.O. box.

en.name: Unclaimed shipment
en.description: Shipment, which could not be delivered neither to the addressee nor to the sender after the return. Also the shipment, which was unsealed in order to find out the address of the addressee or the sender, but these addresses were not found, that is why the shipment was not distributed; also shipment with the mark «Is not subject to return», which could not be delivered to the addressee.

en.name: Undelivered shipment
en.description: Shipment, which could not be delivered due to incorrectness or absence of the required address data of postal service user, also because the addressee has moved or due to other circumstances, which may lead to delivery failure and thus, postal service operator could not fulfill his obligations according to the contract on postal services.

en.name: Undistributed mail
en.description: Shipment, which could not be delivered to the addressee and also could not be delivered to the sender due to the absence of sender's address.

en.name: Unsealing
en.description: Process operation: unsealing of undistributed/ unclaimed shipments.

en.name: Wrapper
en.description: Type of shipment with printed media, documents and other items. Enclosure, size, weight, delivery and packing methods are specified in Code of Postal Service.
